author: Reuters Editorial
title: Dollar index trims gains as Trump says will pull U.S. from Iran nuclear deal
text:
NEW YORK (Reuters) - The dollar briefly pared gains against a basket of currencies on Tuesday as U.S. President Donald Trump said the United States will exit a current deal aimed at curbing Iranâ€™s nuclear weapon activity.
An employee of a bank counts US dollar notes at a branch in Hanoi, Vietnam May 16, 2016. REUTERS/Kham At 2:26 p.m. (2.26 p.m. ET), the index that tracks the greenback against the euro, yen, sterling and three other currencies .DXY was up 0.39 percent at 93.109.
Reporting by Richard Leong; Editing by Chizu Nomiyama
